scenario_text.value:
Oh, you mean there’s something you want to
keep secret? That’s rare. Let’s hear it!
It’s about Miyuki...
You really think she’s our enemy now?

Well...I’m not sure how to explain it,
exactly. You’ll have to see it for yourself.
What do you think, Takuma?

The truth is...I want to believe in Miyuki.
I don’t think she really turned on us.

I’m sure there’s some sort of explanation.
Something she can’t do anything about.
Otherwise it’s just too weird! I mean...

The person who gave me the chance to come
back here in the first place...was Miyuki.
I see... That makes sense.

I don’t think Miyuki betrayed us, either.
I can’t think of her as our enemy.
(Oh... So, Saki agrees with me.)

You have no idea how great it is to hear you
say that... I know how considerate you are.
Heheh... It’s nothing that special. I just...

I don’t want to lose any of the friends I’ve
made in this world. Not one of them...

Plus, the idea of being betrayed by a friend,
or them not trusting us...it’s too painful.
That’s why I...

(What’s this? Is it just me, or does Saki
look really worried...?)

Anyway! The two of us have to have faith in
her, at the very least!
Um, yeah...

Besides, we need Miyuki’s power to get back
to our world, don’t we?
Then our goal is clear!

Yes, we’ll get her back! That’s our only way
forward here.

Right, even if it may turn out to be tougher
than anything else we’ve done so far.
Yeah, I’m sure it won’t be easy.
Well, I’ll be counting on you, then, Takuma!
Yeow! Oh, that smarts... Not so hard, Saki!
Ahaha, sorry!
